DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of rosuvastatin and atorvastatin in subjects with acute coronary syndromes
DOC.brief_title: LUNAR IIIb Study Comparing Rosuvastatin and Atorvastatin in Subjects With Acute Coronary Syndromes
DOC.criteria: NonST segment elevation ACS and ST segment elevation ACS who receive optimal reperfusion therapy Previous Qwave infarct within the last 4 weeks CK elevation not caused by myocardial injury uncontrolled hypertension at time of randomization
